title: Driver's licenses and vehicle registrations
dataVerified: Name, DOB, address, photo, vehicle VIN, license plate
dataVisibleAfterVerification: License/registration status (valid/expired/suspended). Link to DMV system (law enforcement and authorized parties, requires authentication)
rationale: Police/hotels/bars verify authenticity. Barcode + OCR-to-hash complement each other. Prevents fake IDs. Uses SHA-512 to prevent brute-force enumeration.
